description: Mix and match your favorite things and add a bit of textured bling — anything goes in this eclectic “Cozy Boho Studio” jigsaw puzzle! Breathe some free-spirited, creativity into your world as you relax with this “Cozy Boho Studio” puzzle! Imagine yourself in this comfy bohemian artist retreat in the heart of New York City, sipping a lovely cup of tea with refreshing lemon. Baxter is patiently waiting for his walk as soon as you take a break from your digital drawing. Perky Peppa is ready to play keep-away, or join in the jaunt. With loads of delightful details to enjoy, good vibes await with every piece of puzzle fun! This 500-piece Large Format jigsaw puzzle combines easy-to-handle, clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s perfect interlocking fit for a most pleasurable puzzling experience! With pieces 20% larger than standard, details are easy to see, so you can complete it in just a day or two. Crafted with an extra-thick backing and our linen-structured paper, the printed image is vibrant, crisp, and glare-free. Create memorable moments with Ravensburger premium puzzles! About the Artist: Olga is a professional artist who takes her inspiration from film, video games and botanical studies. Olga creates artwork in partnership with Artbeat Studio, which is a collective of talented and successful artists offering a variety of art styles and techniques applicable to a range of different products. Fun for ages 12 and up! Measures approximately 27 x 20 inches (70 x 50 cm) when completed. Made in Germany.
